properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 8 at 10:43AM CST until February 9 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a Flood
Warning for the following rivers in Alabama...

Tallapoosa River At The Tallapoosa Water Plant Affecting Elmore and
Montgomery Counties.

.Recent heavy rainfall continues to produce rises on the Tallapoosa
River. Latest forecasts now predict levels to rise close to flood
stage, and a Flood Warning is now in effect.

The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the Tallapoosa River At The Tallapoosa Water Plant.
* until Sunday morning...or until the warning is cancelled.
* At 10:00 AM Saturday The stage Was 24.8 feet.
* Flood stage is 25 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...The river is expected to rise to near flood stage this
afternoon.
* Impact...At 25 feet...Lower Wetumpka Road starts to flood.
Extensive flooding of low lands occurs and livestock and farm
equipment should be moved to higher ground.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.  Turn Around...Don't Drown.

Another statement will be issued by Sunday morning...or sooner if
conditions warrant.
